title: Microsoft’s CEO Calls Emotional Intelligence the Key to Success in the AI Age
description: Satya Nadella believes emotional, 'soft' workplace skills are more necessary amid the technological upheaval caused by new artificial intelligence tools.
content: It’s an AI world, like it or not, and the revolutionary tech is rapidly changing workplaces—slowly affecting everything staff do from mundane daily office tasks to coding, and even impacting how people apply for jobs and behave with their coworkers. ... [3918 chars]

title: Artificial Intelligence: Revolutionizing Every Aspect of Life - Nebius leverages Microsoft, Meta contracts for AI expansion
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is rapidly redefining the way we live, work, and interact. title: Microsoft lowers AI software sales quota as customers resist new products, The Information reports
description: Dec 3 (Reuters) - Multiple divisions at Microsoft have lowered sales growth targets for certain artificial intelligence products after many sales staff missed goals in the fiscal year that ended in June, The Information reported on Wednesday.

title: B visa sponsorship triggers buzz at IIT
description: A US artificial intelligence recruitment firm's bold hoardings about sponsoring H1-B visas have gone viral at IIT-Delhi. Students are worried about stricter US visa rules and increased fees. The company's message offers encouragement, highlighting the value of Indian tech talent abroad. This initiative provides a sense of comfort and opportunity for students during placement season.
